thread.title: Near everything, basic decor
thread.title_full: Near everything, basic decor - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DollBell
title: Near everything, basic decor
text: This hotel has everything I need, mostly good location. It's a block from the subway, a block from 2 grocery stores and the fish and chips in the downstairs restaurant are really good. Refrigerator in the room, iron and iron board helps. On the Piccadilly line, makes it a one train ride from Heathrow. Some rooms are being updated I'm told. Standard rooms won't win any awards for decor, as they are function rather than beauty.
